message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 8-10-1, translated into en
data: Access to and use of formal financial services is essential. Services such as savings, insurance, payments, credit and remittances enable people to manage their lives, plan and pay their expenses, grow their businesses and improve their overall wellbeing. Banks are one of the key institutions for accessing formal financial services, so having an accessible bank branch is an important starting point for accessing and using financial services. main. Bank branches are complemented by other key access points such as automatic teller machines of all official financial institutions, which can extend financial services to remote locations.
